creator: NOBODYSHOT LTD
descriptionHtml:
Online battles with millions of players from around the world! Tune your weapons, upgrade your character and win!

Features:
- Dynamic battles 5x5 team mode, with up to 10 players in the "Deathmatch" with ranks and matchmaking!
- Easy control with the ability to autoshoot (can be disabled in settings)!
- Good optimization and high FPS!
- More than 20 carefully designed and balanced maps!
- More than 50 units of different types of weapons!
- Weapon customization: sights, silencers, lasers, increased clips, compensators and much more!
- More than 100 of the skins for weapons!
- More than 45 clothes for character customization!
- Beautiful graphics, not occupying much space on your device!
- Clans with the possibility of doing clan wars!

Join the community KUBOOM! It will be hot!
Official Facebook: www.facebook.com/groups/369431510160916/
Our Discord server: https://discord.gg/3D7XZmV

The game requires connection to the Internet.
We don't have any pixel guns, only high quality models.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- 2 new characters: Boris and the Ghost!
- 2 new team maps: 2120 and Hanok
- Molotov cocktail - set fire to enemies!
- In survival mode, destroying a car is no longer a defeat! On the whole map boxes with ammo, medkits and weapons are constantly appearing!
- Optimize the game, improve the interface and fix bugs!

title: KUBOOM 3D: FPS Shooter

creator: Azur Interactive Games Limited
descriptionHtml:
Like PVP FPS games? Want to play a real action shooter game? Ready to take on the challenge?

Then join KUBOOM — a multiplayer first-person shooter with various shooting modes. In this shooter game, you will find everything you need: unique locations, weapon customization, several game modes to suit your playing style, a marketplace to trade with other players and much more. Compete with millions of players from all over the world, promote your fighter to the world top, join the strongest clan or create your own.

Choose a character and customize it. Get a firearm and show the enemies, who’s the boss of the battlefield. In this multiplayer game, you can find almost any weapon: pistol, shotgun, machine gun, or a sniper rifle. Choosing the weapon, pay attention to its stats: each piece varies by damage and accuracy. Get the weapon that suits you best. All weapons in the game can be customized and upgraded: change the barrel to improve the shooting ability, add a trinket or set a scope to shoot like a true sniper. You can also choose among the common, rare, legendary and exotic weapon skins one that will reflect your personality. If it comes to a close combat, use a knife. The game has any kind of blades: from a butterfly knife to a machete. And for those who want to surprise their enemy in a short fight, there is an axe or even a shovel.

Make sure your warrior has all the necessary equipment and get ready for the battle. Grab a couple of grenades. There are frag grenades, smoke grenades, blinding grenades, or Molotov cocktails to pick from. Don’t forget the first aid kit and ammo for your firearm. A protective shield and wires can also come in handy in combat. Combine all selected items in sets. You can create 3 different sets and change them during the fight, choosing the most suitable one for the situation. Sell unnecessary items to other players in the market and buy the ones you need. (Or if you are not sure the item will come in handy, you can rent it for a fight or two to get a proper test).

Play online with users from all over the world or create private battles that only your friends will be able to join. Choose from 6 combat modes:

Gun Mode

Team Deathmatch

Zombie survival

Battle royale

BunnyHop

Duel

Communicate with other players online through voice or text chats. Do not miss the opportunity to get a new gun: for example, weapons can be looted from a killed player during the battle. At the end of the battle, don’t forget to open the prize cards to get keys, bucks, consumables, and secret skins. Keys are used to obtain supplies, clothes, and skins, or improve your equipment. Bucks can be spent on new weapons. Complete daily tasks and get new items for your fighter. Raise your warrior’s rank and climb to the top of the leaderboard to bring fame to your clan. Put your name in the hall of fame among the strongest players in the world. Between the fights in this shooter you can check the statistics of all the battles you or your friends took part in. Find out the total number of battles, the number of victories, and even how many fighters were killed in the entire game.

Customize the controls to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a shooting game - everyone knows that a convenient controls layout makes half of the victory. Disable or enable auto-shooting and choose a place on the screen for aiming buttons. You can also adjust the volume of music, sounds, voice chat and microphone. This shooter even has the ability to configure the control specifically for left-handed people.

Take part in a tactical combat and plunge into the atmosphere of dynamic battles and clan wars.

Please note: the game requires a permanent Internet connection.
descriptionShort: Online multiplayer shooting games: action PvP shooter. Shoot a gun in FPS games

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New "Bomb" mode with rounds and weapon purchases!
- New collection of "Wave" skins and 2 new cases!
- Improved the effects and recoil of weapons, added sounds of hits!
- Reworked Playlist mode!
- Accelerated matchmaking and added a warm-up!
- Improved artificial intelligence of bots!
- A lot of improvements and bug fixes!

Zombie survival
